meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Table</kanji> <kanji>sphere</kanji> is a sport where you have a table and then you use a sphere on it. That's <vocabulary>table tennis</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>ping pong</vocabulary>. Makes sense, right? You use a ping pong ball and you play on a table.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Careful of たく's shortening.
